s0102: Thus entered the passes, gathered scattered troops and again went east.
s0103: The next year, Marquis Huaiyin defeated Qi, established himself as King of Qi, sent envoys to inform the King of Han.
s0104: The King of Han greatly angered and cursed, Chen Ping stepped on the King of Han's foot.
s0105: The King of Han also awoke, then treated the Qi envoy generously, had Zhang Zifang finally establish Xin as King of Qi.
s0107: Used his extraordinary strategies, ultimately extinguished Chu.
s0108: Constantly as Protector of the Army Commandant followed in pacifying King Yan Zang Tu.
s0109: Han year 6, someone submitted a memorial accusing King Chu Han Xin of rebellion.
s0110: Gaozu asked the generals, the generals said: 'Urgently dispatch troops and bury the bastard.'
s0112: Asked Chen Ping, Ping firmly declined and apologized, said: 'What do the generals say?'
s0114: Chen Ping said: 'The person who submitted the memorial saying Xin rebels—does anyone know about it?'
s0118: Chen Ping said: 'Your majesty's elite troops compared to Chu's?'
s0120: Ping said: 'Your majesty's generals who use troops—any who surpass Han Xin?'
s0122: Ping said: 'Now troops are not as elite as Chu's, generals cannot match, yet raise troops to attack him—this is rushing him into battle, I secretly worry for your majesty.'
s0124: Ping said: 'In ancient times the Son of Heaven toured and inspected, assembled the feudal lords.
s0125: In the south there is Yunmeng, your majesty should go out pretending to tour Yunmeng, assemble the feudal lords at Chen.
s0126: Chen is Chu's western border, Xin hearing the Son of Heaven goes out on a pleasure tour, by necessity he will have no affairs and come to welcome and greet in the suburbs.
s0127: When he greets, your majesty then captures him—this is particularly the work of one strongman.'
s0128: Gaozu considered it right, so sent envoys to inform the feudal lords to assemble at Chen, 'I will tour south to Yunmeng.'
s0129: The emperor then followed to go.
s0130: Before reaching Chen, King Chu Xin indeed came to welcome in the suburbs on the road.
s0131: Gaozu had prepared warriors in advance, seeing Xin arrive, immediately seized and bound him, loaded him in the rear carriage.
s0132: Xin called out: 'The realm is already settled, I certainly should be boiled!'
s0133: Gaozu turned and told Xin: 'You be silent!
s0135: The warriors bound him with hands behind back.
s0136: Thus assembled the feudal lords at Chen, completely pacified Chu territory.
s0137: Returned to Luoyang, pardoned Xin to be Marquis of Huaiyin, and with the meritorious officials shared the tally and determined enfeoffments.
s0138: Thus shared the tally with Ping, never to be extinguished generation after generation, as Marquis of Huyou.
s0139: Ping declined, saying: 'This is not your servant's merit.'
s0140: The emperor said: 'I used sir's strategies, won victories and conquered enemies—what is this if not merit?'
s0141: Ping said: 'Without Wei Wuzhi how could your servant advance?'
s0143: 'You can be called one who does not forget his roots.'
s0145: The next year, as Protector of the Army Commandant followed in attacking the rebel King Han Xin in Dai.
s0146: Ultimately reached Pingcheng, was surrounded by the Xiongnu, seven days without food.
s0147: Gaozu used Chen Ping's extraordinary strategy, sent gifts to the Chanyu's consort, the siege thus lifted.
s0148: Gaozu having left, the strategy was secret, the world could not hear it.
s0149: Gaozu passing south through Qu Ni, ascended its city wall, saw its buildings were very large, said: 'Magnificent county!
s0150: I have traveled the realm, only seen Luoyang and this.'
s0151: Turned and asked the imperial secretary: 'How many households does Qu Ni have?'
